official-title.#text: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to conduct a study of economically beneficial uses of the rights-of-way associated with certain highways, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Study of economically beneficial uses of the rights-of-way associated with certain highways

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall conduct a study of economically beneficial uses of the rights-of-way associated with highways constructed with Federal assistance, which shall include—

text.#text: the identification of economically beneficial activities that may be carried out with respect to those rights-of-way to ensure that—
those rights-of-way are used in the most economically beneficial manner compatible with transportation purposes; and
economic underutilization of those rights-of-way is minimized to the extent possible;
an analysis of the costs and benefits, including with respect to safety, of carrying out the economically beneficial activities identified under paragraph (1);
an analysis of barriers to carrying out the economically beneficial activities identified under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: and how that revenue may be used to support transportation infrastructure.

text.#text: an analysis of the revenue that may be generated by carrying out the economically beneficial activities identified under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: and make available to States a report on the results of the study conducted under
, which shall include legislative recommendations based on the results.

text.#text: Not later than 180 days after the date of enactment of this Act, the

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 3048 IH: Maximize Our Highways Act of 2013

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}rights.#text: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
